mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson
mdRecord.dcterms:description: F H Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 19 1862. By Telegraph from Charleston 19 1862. Lieut H. J. Roherbecker has reported to Col Paxton for duty as adj't who refuses to receive him having made another selection what shall I do in this case J.A.J. Lightburn Col Comdg 29D91pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson
Charleston, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
